answers.answer: Hi,The weight gain does seem excessive even for a twin pregnancy. You should consult your gynaecologist to rule out any complications like diabetes, hydramnios etc. Also a consultation with a dietician will be of help.Take care and good luck.

question: HELLO I AM CURRENTLY 6MTHS WITH TWINS JUST WONDERIN IF 40 POUNDS TOO MUCH TO GAIN BY 6 MONTHS.
title: Weight gaib
